paragraph_content: You can encounter this miniboss while exploring the large area partway through the Bamboo Grove in Snake Trail. From the Shrine, you can either head up and over the bridge, or jump through a grove of bamboo left of the shrine to reach a stream.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
You can encounter this miniboss while exploring the large area partway through the Bamboo Grove in Snake Trail. From the Shrine, you can either head up and over the bridge, or jump through a grove of bamboo left of the shrine to reach a stream.

paragraph_content: This is located on the opposite side of the Village Entrance Shrine when heading to Sandgate Village. From the Shrine, you can also hop down a nearby ditch and pass under a bridge to find a tunnel leading to a friendly Xu Dog Guai, who will ask for your help in defeating the Yaoguai Chief.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
This is located on the opposite side of the Village Entrance Shrine when heading to Sandgate Village. From the Shrine, you can also hop down a nearby ditch and pass under a bridge to find a tunnel leading to a friendly Xu Dog Guai, who will ask for your help in defeating the Yaoguai Chief.

alt_text: Spirit Power Baw Li Guhh Lang.jpg
img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game interface, specifically from the "Equipment" menu. It displays a selection of "Spirits" on the left side, with one spirit highlighted. The highlighted spirit is named "Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang" and is classified as "Epic." It has a high Qi cost and features an ability called "Tongue Whip," which allows the player to take the form of Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang and use its tongue to attack enemies from a distance, dealing significant damage. The equipped effect of this spirit moderately reduces the stamina cost for jumps and jump attacks. The interface also shows various player stats on the right side, such as health, stamina, and attack power. The option to equip this spirit is available, and there is a demo video that can be watched.
